attributes.additional_details: Mid-Cheshire has lost its dedicated radio service 92.5 Cheshire FM. Ofcom has stated it is not willing to transfer there license to new owners, so the towns of Northwich, Winsford, Middlewich, Sandbach, Knutsford & Crewe are left without a dedicated service. Please support us to bring back the station to keep things 'Local'.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Ofcom
